name: facesnap
description: 人脸检测与识别服务 - 前后端统一启动管理

scripts.install: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "cd backend && uv sync" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.install:musa: cd backend && pip install -r requirements_musa.txt && pip install --no-deps 'facenet-pytorch>=2.5.3'
scripts.backend: cd backend && uv run python run.py
scripts.database:init: cd backend && uv run python scripts/init_database.py
